page.title: 10Tollesbury Industrial Area.
page.content: In Tollesbury we have a small Industrial area. It varies from eletronics works to light engineering. There are two electric companys one telephones and radios. There are also five boat builders,a crash repair garage,an engineering company and a rubber company, all of the factories grouped together, and no one can go further than the marina because of the River Blackwater. The boat building is most popular because of the river which is good for sailing on. Boats are displayed outside with their prices on, you could if you wanted, have a boat especially built for you and your needs. Here are the names of some of the companies:_ Sound Power Telephones, Gamart, Wilks Rubberplastics, Nixons.
